## Matrix.decompose() method

Decomposes the current Matrix into a translation, rotation and scaling components

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decompose(scale?: Vector3, rotation?: Quaternion, translation?: Vector3): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the scale vector3 given as a reference to update |
|  rotation | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the rotation quaternion given as a reference to update |
|  translation | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the translation vector3 given as a reference to update |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if operation was successful
